ValidationRule.description: For a Sites AE (role contains Sites IS AE2), they should hit a blocker when trying to save the “Sites - Unload Account” checkbox as True IF there is an open revenue opportunity on the account where Sites ACV bookings > 0
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name ,'Sites IS AE2'), Total_Sites_Pipeline_Number__c > 0, ISCHANGED( Sites_Unload_Account__c ), Sites_Unload_Account__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This account can not be dropped. AEs, please Close Lost any open revenue opportunities with Sites pipeline.
